Its hard to image these celebrities are called anything else other than the names we know them by PERIOD

While youd think these acclaimed Hollywood stars were given names with star quality from birth it turns out theyre not who they say they are PERIOD

From evolved childhood nicknames to boosting their careers whatever the reasons these famous faces all go by pseudonyms

Its hard to image these celebrities are called anything else other than the names we know them by PERIOD While youd think these acclaimed Hollywood stars were given names with star quality from birth it turns out theyre not who they say they are PERIOD From evolved childhood nicknames to boosting their careers whatever the reasons these famous faces all go by pseudonyms

The Israeli actress had a traditional Hebrew name when she was born but ended up changing it after her family emigrated to the United States in  PERIOD The family ditched the Jewish surname opting for Portman instead and NetaLee evolved into Natalie PERIOD

The Summer Time Sadness singer  was Lizzy Grant up until the age of 25yearsold when she decided to adopt a new moniker PERIOD

In a  interview with complex Ocean revealed he changed his name legally a year prior because it didnt seem cool enough PERIOD He said None of us are our names PERIOD 

Known as a Legend in his inner circle his nickname grew into his stage name PERIOD He said I was just like You know what Lets just go for it PERIOD People are going to pay attention and Im going to either live up to my name or Im not PERIOD 

Even though she prefers being called Ella the New Zealand singer didnt think her name had star quality and called herself Lorde for allure PERIOD She said I basically chose Lorde because I wanted a name that was really strong and had this grandeur to it PERIOD I didnt feel that my birth name was anything special PERIOD I always liked the idea of having like a onenamed alias.No one christened me that PERIOD I am Karen but I was a bit of a farter PERIOD 

The singersongwriter wanted a more musical moniker to add some razzle dazzle PERIOD She would have settled for Alicia Wild but after being discouraged by her mother who said it sounded like a stripper she went with Keys instead PERIOD She said In first or second grade there was a girl named Helena and it got confusing with the teacher who had to call out our names and so the teacher asked my mom If I needed to call Jelena a nickname what would it be And my mom was like I call her Gigi sometimes and the name stuck. originally published on celebretainment.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD
